showerReviews.reviewText: Everything I expect from a Love's-- fuel, food, and clean restrooms. Great selection of chips, especially happy that they were carrying Carolina Reaper and Ghost Pepper chips in their selection. Good selection of beverages as well.

Don't stop here if you need to use the women's bathroom. Staff lie with a sign about "a man cleaning it," and tell you to "see cashier about using the shower." Then the shower is full and they tell you "you'll have to wait." Then a woman ‚Ä¶

Great place! I'm constantly impressed by Loves when it comes to quality. This one in specific is very clean and sturdy. But the main thing I love about this Loves is that it has free air. So whenever my tires are a little deflated, I can ‚Ä¶
Mens Restroom closed for cleaning. I understand that, but then they have two showers would not let no one use the bathroom in them. They was open.

Clean restrooms and friendly workers. This is a smaller store and doesn't have many truck items. However, they have the basics, some pantry items, roller foods, and plenty of snacks and drinks. The Subway inside was clean and had seating to ‚Ä¶

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
probably the only updated gas station. the first human, clean and well-kept gas station in my experience. ü§óü§∏üõÄü•≥
üÖøÔ∏è  Parking

üçî Food

üöø  Shower

üõéÔ∏è  Service

üöª  Restroom
everything is at the highest level ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Showers are clean and you can control the water temp from hot hot to cold and the pressure is good, but the lack of ventilation is crazy bad. You‚Äôll be sweating before you can dry off and if you have long hair and need to use a hair dryer, ‚Ä¶

The store and every aspect were awesome. Except for the showers, there is no water pressure, what so ever which makes the shower floor super slippery and extremely dangerous from the soap not being able to rinsed fast enough
Very clean showers. Should be a 5 star on being so clean. Only two small problems,  1) Needs better water pressure.  Very low.    2) No soap dish in shower.

This is a NEW TA! Super nice staff and brand new showers water takes about 5 or 6 minutes to heat up, no soap dispensers in shower stalls yet so make sure you bring your own...Also no restaurants yet. But they do have small pizzas, hot ‚Ä¶
The place was nice and clean with friendly staff. But the water pressure in the shower was very bad and the hot water wasn't working half the time.

Not happy that one can not get a shower after fueling 200 gallons of fuel from the receipt anymore....have to have an UltraOne card, had one, but TA deactivates them after 6 months of no use...tried to call to get card reactivated, but call ‚Ä¶
We got fuel, took a shower and got some stuff in the store. The staff were very helpful. The facility is very clean.

‚Ä¶ dates but overall a decent truck stop. They do have Hunts Brothers pizza available, a small driver's lounge that has a shower or two, and an apartment size washer and dryer available. They just renovated the restrooms in the main ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice and clean shower. Plenty of hot water and good water pressure. Friendly staff
The best shower I‚Äôve had on the road! Felt like a high quality hotel or even close to a shower at home. Hot water and clean!

I didn't get any photos, but i stopped on my way to Las Vegas, NV.  I paid for shower service and got in right away.  It was very sufficient, clean, and everything worked properly.  The cashier line got long sometimes, i noticed.  overall, ‚Ä¶

Even though I had shower credits I was unable to use them at this location. I was told the TA system was down but I was able to purchase one for $16. Come on TA, that‚Äôs ridiculous. Why would you make someone pay when it‚Äôs a problem on your ‚Ä¶
